atlantis.gamedataÂ¶

atlantis.gamedata subpackage contains some modules in charge of handling Atlantis PBEM gamedata, since a game’s rules (static information not changing during the game) to turn information, as map, orders, etc. All of these modules use atlantis.helpers.json functions to dump and load their data.

Modules in atlantis.gamedata package:

atlantis.gamedata.region Handles Atlantis PBEM regions.
atlantis.gamedata.rules Handles Atlantis PBEM world rules.

Contents of atlantis.gamedata package:

  • atlantis.gamedata.gamedata
    • GameData
  • atlantis.gamedata.region
    • Region
  • atlantis.gamedata.rules
    • TerrainType
    • AtlantisRules
